name: The Table of Rolls
description:
How far upon the board can you roll?

Controls
Mouse Controls:
Hold left click + move mouse - control hand
Keyboard S or click bottom right of viewport - open settings
Touch Controls (unfortunately, d6 on mobile for me are invisible and since jam submission window is over I can't change their mesh, but game is still playable outside of that)
Touchscreen press -> move -> release - control hand
